description: Tastefully updated & rarely available end unit at LYNNMOUR WEST featuring a complete makeover with over $150,000 spent on renovations. Chefs will love the open plan kitchen with granite counters, s/s appliances including gas stove, tons of extra built in storage & all extending to a fully fenced spacious sundeck complete with gazebo & gas hookup. You will appreciate the hardwood (not laminate) flooring, designer light fixtures, gas fireplace, recessed lighting throughout &  fresh paint. The sunken living room features wall to wall windows and accesses a sunny west facing deck. The huge primary bedroom also offers a private balcony, a full ensuite and even a view.  There are 2 covered parking stalls, a storage area, an outdoor pool and convenient access to transit & downtown. OPEN SAT  2-4.
